item.title: Zoe add a quote by Catherine Clark
item.description: "I hate when I'm an idiot and I don't know it. I like to be aware of my idiocy, to really revel in it, take pictures." -- Catherine Clark

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "Love sucks. Sometimes it feels good. Sometimes it's just another way to bleed." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "Maybe they know what I know, that the true way to a man's heart is six inches of metal between his ribs. Sometimes four inches will do the job, but to be really sure, I like to have six." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "People, generally, suck." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "There's some heinous fuckery goin' on mon." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Don't be ridiculous, Charlie, people love the parents who beat their kids in department stores. It's the ones who just let their kids wreak havoc that everybody hates." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Christopher Moore
Zoe add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "She's so small, yet she contains so much evil." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Jennifer Weiner
item.description: "It's as if the fasion designers decided that once a woman hit a certain weight, she'd have no need for business suits, for skirts and blazers, for anything except glorified sweatsuits, and they tried to apologize for dressing us like overaged Teletubbies by silk-screening daisies on the tops." -- Jennifer Weiner

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "If I had a world of my own, everything would be nonsense. Nothing would be what it is, because everything would be what it isn't. And contrary wise, what is, it wouldn't be. And what it wouldn't be, it would. You see?" -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "All God does is watch us and kill us when we get boring. We must never, ever be boring." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "It's only after we've lost everything that we're free to do anything." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "If you gave someone your heart and they died, did they take it with them? Did you spend the rest of forever with a hole inside you that couldn't be filled?" -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Zoe add a quote by Anne Rice
item.description: "None of us really changes over time. We only become more fully what we are." -- Anne Rice
